item.title: Electra by Euripides
item.description: Play by Euripides. It is in GB Volume 5. Newsletter post: www.readgreatbooks.info/p/great-books-ep-86-euripides-electra People in the play: Peasant, of Mycenae, Electra, Clytaemnestra, Orestes, Pylades, Chorus of Argive Country-Women, Old Man, Messenger, The Dioscuri Electra - Highlights Metadata Author: Euripides Full Title: Electra Category:books URL: readwise.io/reader/document_raw_content/227397522 Highlights And whoso counts me but a fool for leaving a tender maid untouched when I have her in my house, to him I say, he measures purity by the vicious standard of his own soul, a standard like himself.
